title: Workshop on Designing and Implementing Medical Education Innovation Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Practical experience in the medical field and basic educational design principles understanding
context.additional_context: Blended education for current healthcare practitioners in a smartphone-based, limited technological environment. A program enhancing educational innovation capabilities by applying instructional design theories and completing practical project-based tasks.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the theoretical foundations of educational strategies and apply them to medical education design.
Learners can develop innovative instructional methods that are implementable in limited technological environments.
Learners can create educational materials applicable to real-world educational settings through project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
